title: Researchers discover a flipping crab feeding on methane seeps

title_detail.value: Researchers discover a flipping crab feeding on methane seeps

summary: Researchers have documented a group of tanner crabs vigorously feeding at a methane seep on the seafloor off British Columbia -- one of the first times a commercially harvested species has been seen using this energy source.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have documented a group of tanner crabs vigorously feeding at a methane seep on the seafloor off British Columbia -- one of the first times a commercially harvested species has been seen using this energy source.
